name: Football WorldCup Soccer 2018: Champion League
description:
For lovers of football, we present the supper FootBall Worldcup Soccer 2018 game in history football league in 2017. Play Football WorldCup Soccer 2018 with a newest and faster game experience. Play Football Worldcup Soccer 2018 is the amazing football fun soccer game, bringing on mobile to a very new era and it's better than ever. The game offers realistic and amazing football experience to date. It is the most addictive football game on the mobile market with smooth and realistic gameplay. The Football Game is the best mobile football soccer simulation and realistic animation and action game.

Modes of Football Worldcup Soccer 2018:

1- Quick Play
2- Tournament

- Quick Play:
In quick play mode, you can select player or opponent team from these countries i.e Argentina, Brazil, England, France, Germany, Italy, Portugal, Spain, Switzerland, Turkey, Uruguay, America. In this mode, you can select both player and opponent team also.

- Tournament:
In Tournament mode, just you can select only player team. The opponent team will be selected by computer.

Brilliant Football 3D Game Features:
- HD 3D graphics, animations, physics implementations.
- Real football world cup game
- The Game wins your heart.
